## Description The image is a logo for the brand "Kärcher." The logo features the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the text, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast to make the brand name stand out prominently. ## K 7 POWER FLEX Für mehr Power: der K 7 Power Flex-Hochdruckreiniger mit PremiumFlex-Schlauch, G 180 Q-Pistole, für hartnäckige Verschmutzungen auf Terrassen, Wegen und Autos geeignet. ## Description The image shows a yellow and black pressure washer with the model designation "K7" visible on the side. The device is upright with two large wheels for mobility. It has a handle on top for easy transportation. Attached to the front is a hose reel, and there are two detachable spray lances placed in front of the machine. The pressure washer is designed for heavy-duty cleaning tasks, suitable for outdoor surfaces like patios, driveways, and vehicles. The brand name is visible on the lower front part of the machine. ## Bestell-Nr. 1.317-300.0 - Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung - Ausziehbarer Teleskopgriff - Besonders leistungsfähiger wassergekühlter Motor ## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4006529122759
Stromart V / Hz 230 / 50
Druck bar / MPA 20 - max. 180 / 2 - max. 18
Fördermenge l/h max. 600
Flächenleistung m²/h 60
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 60
Anschlussleistung kW 3
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 17,3
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 23
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 458 × 330 × 669
## Ausstattung
Ausstattung Details
Hochdruckpistole G 180 Q
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [x]
Integriertes Aufbewahrungsnetz [x]
HD-Schlauch 10 m / PremiumFlex
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Plug 'n' Clean-System
Teleskopgriff [x]
Wasserkühlter Motor [x]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
## Description The image is a logo representing a "Guinness World Records" emblem. It features a circular design with a blue outer ring and a white inner circle. The text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" is written in uppercase letters around the top half of the circle. In the center, there is a stylized trophy or cup icon. Below the circular emblem, there is a rectangular section with a gold background. The text "RECORD HOLDER" is prominently displayed in uppercase letters within this section. This logo signifies that the holder has achieved a record recognized by Guinness World Records. ## Description The image is a logo featuring a blue geometric shape with a circle of stars in the center, resembling the European Union flag. Below the shape, the text reads "Made in Europe." - **Shape**: The shape is a stylized, angular design, predominantly blue. - **Stars**: There are 12 stars arranged in a circle, similar to the EU flag. - **Text**: The phrase "Made in Europe" is written in a simple, sans-serif font beneath the shape. This logo likely indicates that a product is manufactured within Europe, emphasizing European origin and standards. ## Description of Figure The image is a logo or symbol with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized design that includes an arrow pointing upwards, intersecting with a circular shape. Below this design, there is a horizontal line. The entire symbol is enclosed within a square. At the bottom of the image, there is text that reads: **+100% POWER** This text is in yellow, matching the color of the symbol above it. The design suggests themes of energy, power, or efficiency, possibly indicating a brand or product related to these concepts.

chunks.text:
## Description

The image is a logo for the brand "Kärcher." The logo features the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the text, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast to make the brand name stand out prominently.

## K 7 POWER FLEX

Für mehr Power: der K 7 Power Flex-Hochdruckreiniger mit PremiumFlex-Schlauch, G 180 Q-Pistole, für hartnäckige Verschmutzungen auf Terrassen, Wegen und Autos geeignet.

## Description

The image shows a yellow and black pressure washer with the model designation "K7" visible on the side. The device is upright with two large wheels for mobility. It has a handle on top for easy transportation. Attached to the front is a hose reel, and there are two detachable spray lances placed in front of the machine. The pressure washer is designed for heavy-duty cleaning tasks, suitable for outdoor surfaces like patios, driveways, and vehicles. The brand name is visible on the lower front part of the machine.

## Bestell-Nr.

1.317-300.0

- Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung
- Ausziehbarer Teleskopgriff
- Besonders leistungsfähiger wassergekühlter Motor

## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4006529122759
Stromart V / Hz 230 / 50
Druck bar / MPA 20 - max. 180 / 2 - max. 18
Fördermenge l/h max. 600
Flächenleistung m²/h 60
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 60
Anschlussleistung kW 3
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 17,3
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 23
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 458 × 330 × 669

## Ausstattung
Ausstattung Details
Hochdruckpistole G 180 Q
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [x]
Integriertes Aufbewahrungsnetz [x]
HD-Schlauch 10 m / PremiumFlex
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Plug 'n' Clean-System
Teleskopgriff [x]
Wasserkühlter Motor [x]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]

## Description

The image is a logo representing a "Guinness World Records" emblem. It features a circular design with a blue outer ring and a white inner circle. The text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" is written in uppercase letters around the top half of the circle. In the center, there is a stylized trophy or cup icon.

Below the circular emblem, there is a rectangular section with a gold background. The text "RECORD HOLDER" is prominently displayed in uppercase letters within this section.

This logo signifies that the holder has achieved a record recognized by Guinness World Records.

## Description

The image is a logo featuring a blue geometric shape with a circle of stars in the center, resembling the European Union flag. Below the shape, the text reads "Made in Europe." 

- **Shape**: The shape is a stylized, angular design, predominantly blue.
- **Stars**: There are 12 stars arranged in a circle, similar to the EU flag.
- **Text**: The phrase "Made in Europe" is written in a simple, sans-serif font beneath the shape.

This logo likely indicates that a product is manufactured within Europe, emphasizing European origin and standards.

## Description of Figure

The image is a logo or symbol with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized design that includes an arrow pointing upwards, intersecting with a circular shape. Below this design, there is a horizontal line. The entire symbol is enclosed within a square.

At the bottom of the image, there is text that reads:

**+100% POWER**

This text is in yellow, matching the color of the symbol above it. The design suggests themes of energy, power, or efficiency, possibly indicating a brand or product related to these concepts.
